summary: Area bounded by lines joining points forming a polygon around Itarsi.

name: VAD 221

name: VAD 222
regulation: No flight is permitted in the area. A heavy tethered balloon with military payload. Risk of interception in case of inadvertent penetration. Activities permanent.
summary: Circular area centered on Mothala within a 6NM radius.

name: VAD 223
regulation: Controlling Authority: LPR Khamaria, Jabalpur. Days/duration of activity will be notified by NOTAM, at least seven days in advance. Danger area will be deactivated during flight operations at Jabalpur as per letter of agreement between ATS Authority, Jabalpur Airport and LPR Khamaria, Jabalpur.
summary: Area bounded by lines joining points forming a polygon around LPR Khamaria, Jabalpur.

name: VAD 23
regulation: Activities Permanent.
summary: Area bounded by rectangular coordinates forming a polygon around Samrat.

name: VAD 24
regulation: Naval flying area.
summary: Area bounded by lines joining points forming a polygon around the Naval Flying Area.

name: VAD 25
regulation: Ground to Air firing. Activity and duration will be notified in advance through NOTAM.
summary: Area bounded by the shorter arc of a circle forming a sector around Okha Seaward.

name: VAD 26
regulation: Missile firing range. The range is suitably limited to a maximum of two weeks in a year and the activation of the range is intimated 7 days in advance by a Class I NOTAM. Communication link between the range and the ATS units at Mumbai and Ahmedabad is established by army authorities. Army liaison Officer is positioned in the ATS units at Ahmedabad and Mumbai during the period of activity of the range. The range activity is discontinued as and when communication link between ATS unit and range becomes unserviceable. Prior clearance from ATC Mumbai.
summary: Area bounded by rectangular coordinates forming a polygon around Little Rann.

name: VAD 27

name: VAP 2
location: Tower of Silence – Malabar Hills, Mumbai
regulation: Only manned fixed-wing aircraft are permitted to operate at or above 11000 FT AMSL.
summary: Circular area centered on Tower of Silence – Malabar Hills, Mumbai within a 1NM radius.

name: VAP 224
regulation: No person shall fly or assist in flying an aircraft within the specified airspace.
summary: Circular area centered on Khambaliya within a 5KM radius.

name: VAP 3

name: VAR 34
regulation: HAL test flying area. Controlling authority Ozar ATC. Watch hours as notified in NOTAM. Any aircraft intending to transit the airspace shall contact Ozar tower frequency 123.5/120.6 MHz before entering the airspace.
summary: Area bounded by lines joining points and a clockwise arc of a circle forming a sector around Ojhar.

name: VAR 37
regulation: Controlling authority ATC Pune. Aircraft intending to operate within the Restricted airspace must establish/maintain R/T contact with ATC Pune.
summary: Area bounded by lines joining points forming a polygon around Pune.
